attributes.action: REMOVE TUITON FEES IN ENGLAND AS IT AMMOUNTS TO A HIGHER DISCRIMINATORY TAX FOR ENGLAND
attributes.additional_details: The tuition fees for england summount to a higher tax on  england. residents  When we all pay into a uk tax fund and have additional tax as the graduate tax as well as the health tax costs of dental / prescription/ eyetest charges. This means that England is paying more tax than the other UK countries. HEALTH AND EDUCATION SHOULD BE EQUITABLE TO ALL IN THE UK. The english should not have to pay more for health and education when this tax is central.
